name: Granny 3D File
summary: A GR2 file is a 3D model or animation file created using Granny 3D, a toolkit developed by RAD Game Tools (now part of Epic Games). It stores data such as 3D meshes, textures, skeletons, and animations. Game developers use GR2 files to save animated characters and objects, which they load into a game engine during the development process.
